attributes.action: Inquest into why Sadiq Khan failed on numerous promises, like crime reduction.
attributes.additional_details: People who voted for Sadiq Khan to be Mayor of London based on his promises on Crime Reduction,Transport, Policing, Housing, Fire Services, Health, Air Pollution and many other issues of serious concern. He has not provided us with any of that and keeps failing on promises.
attributes.background: Inquest into Sadiq Khan due to his failure on all issues and not delivering on all promises. He seems to think it is acceptable to make false promises to get people to vote for him and then go back on his word on many issues like reducing crime and air pollution.

rejection.details:
Scrutiny of the Mayor of London is a matter for the London Assembly, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about the Mayor's job performance you could petition the London Assembly. You can find out how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
